input_args.passage: 'Hagia Irene | Hagia Irene (Greek: Αγία Ειρήνη) or Hagia Eirene sometimes known also as Saint Irene, is an Eastern Orthodox church located in the outer courtyard of ...'
input_args.claim: 'Third, they are both churches, with the Church of St. Mary of the Spring specifically mentioned as a church in the first and third sources, and Hagia Irene described as an Eastern Orthodox church in the second source.'
